lead_paragraph: Jets punter Steve Weatherford is a former decathlete. So let's get a little up-close-and-personal with his decision to run instead of punt on fourth-and-18 in Jets territory. (He wound up half a yard short.)
snippet: Jets punter Steve Weatherford's decision to run instead of punt on fourth-and-18 didn't work. But what was most troubling for some was that he had the latitude to make that decision on his own.
abstract: Jets punter Steve Weatherford's decision to run instead of punt on fourth-and-18 didn't work. But what was most troubling for some was that he had the latitude to make that decision on his own.
